channel.title: C on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in C on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Project Euler - Number 308
item.description: Project Euler has a Fractran problem. If you don’t know about John Conway’s Fractran you can look here and here. You can find the problem here: https://projecteuler.net/problem=308 I have reproduced it here: A program written in the programming language Fractran consists of a list of fractions. The internal state of the Fractran Virtual Machine is a positive integer, which is initially set to a seed value. Each iteration of a Fractran program multiplies the state integer by the first fraction in the list which will leave it an integer.

item.title: The C Programming Language
item.description: Some time ago, I was on a reddit thread and someone commented that they knew python and wondered if they should learn C â€¦ I thought everybody knew C! ;) Back in the day, C was my third or fourth programming language. With the mention of C I just had to break out my copy of The C Programming Language. Unfortunately, my original copy is long gone but I have the second edition.
